sprykerComponent.name: quick-order-form
sprykerComponent.readme: Displays a form with several rows which includes autocomplete product search, measuring unit, quantity and price. Also user can add/remove rows, add products to cart or directly create a new order.

defines.name: data
defines.contract:
form: required,
    products: [],
    prices: [],
    additionalColumns: [],
    fileTemplateExtensions: [],
    textOrderForm: required,
    uploadOrderForm: required

methods.name: addRow
methods.description: Sends an ajax request to the server and renders the response on the page.

tags.name: template
tags.description: The argument type returned by a successful promise.

methods.name: removeRow
methods.description: Sends an ajax request to the server and renders the response on the page.

parameters.name: rowIndex
parameters.description: A row string index used for removal.

tags.name: template
tags.description: The argument type returned by a successful promise.

methods.name: getFormData
methods.description: Gets an instance of the FormData.

parameters.name: appendData
parameters.description: An optional data object for extension of the returned data.

tags.name: template
tags.description: A data type returned by the function.

tags.name: returns
tags.description: A data instance of the FormData type.
